card.description: This dataset contains measurement data about popular brands of jeans.

context.potentialUses: Predict the price of a pair of jeans based on who they're for, the size of the pockets, etc.

fields.description: The fit or style of jeans, e.g. skinny or boot cut.
Whether the jeans were sold to target men or women.
Amount of cotton in the fabric, where 0 means no cotton at all, and 1 means 100% cotton.
The price of the jeans in US dollars.
The height of the front pocket from its deepest part.
The height of the front pocket from its most shallow part.
Front pocket openings curve down towards the side of the leg, ending in a rivet. This number measures the distance from the top of the pocket to that rivet.
The width of the front pocket from its widest part.
The width of the front pocket from its narrowest part.
The width of the back pocket from its widest part.
The width of the back pocket from its narrowest part.
The height of the back pocket from its deepest part.
The height of the back pocket from its shallowest part.
